Apollo is a platform for building a data graph, a communication layer that seamlessly connects your application clients (such as React and iOS apps) to your back-end services. Is an implementation of GraphQL designed for the needs of product engineering teams building modern, data-driven applications. -
What you need to know about Apollo, at least for now, is it‚Äôs a community that builds on top of GraphQL and provides different
tools to help you build your projects
. The tools provided by Apollo are mainly 2: Client and Server.
helps your Frontend communicate with a GraphQL API. It has support for the most popular frameworks such as React, Vue, or Angular and native development on iOS and Android.
is the GraphQL server layer in your backend that delivers the responses back to the client requests.
Now that you understand Apollo better and why we will use it, let‚Äôs continue setting up GraphQL.
A GraphQL Schema is at the core of any GraphQL server implementation. It
describes the shape of your data
, defining it with a hierarchy of
with fields that are populated from your data source and specifies which
are available, so the client knows about the information that can be requested or sent.
For example, if we wanted to build a music application, our simplest schema, usually defined in a

type Song {
  title: String
  author: Author
}

type Author {
  name: String
  songs: [Song]
}
, each returning a list of the corresponding type.

type Query {
  getSongs: [Song]
  getAuthors: [Author]
}

Inside it, we set the server URL to which we will make the request.
const GRAPHQL_URL = 'http://localhost:9000/';
Next, we define our async function
to, fetch the greeting from the server. We will use the
to perform the HTTP request which by default returns a promise to which we can subscribe and get the answer asynchronously.

async function fetchGreeting() {
  const response = await fetch(GRAPHQL_URL, {
    method: 'POST',
    headers: {
      'content-type': 'application/json',
    },
    body: JSON.stringify({
      query: `
        query {
          greeting
        }
      `,
    }),
  });

  const responseBody = await response.json();
  console.log(responseBody);
}
